metadata.title: CVE-2022-45143 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The JsonErrorReportValve in Apache Tomcat 8.5.83, 9.0.40 to 9.0.68 and10.1.0-M1 to 10.1.1 did not escape the type, message or description values.In some circumstances these are constructed from user provided data and itwas therefore possible for users to supply values that invalidated ormanipulated the JSON output.

criterions.comment: tomcat8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
